meanings.definition: Absorb or remove with a mop.
meanings.sent1: He is mopping up the water from the leak.
meanings.sent2: After the party, we spent hours mopping up the spilled drinks.
meanings.sent3: The sponge was mopping up the soapy bubbles with ease.
meanings.sent4: His words mopped up her tears and brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent5: The towel was mopping up the mess in no time.
